body.name: THE NORTH FACE Berkeley Field Bag

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Brandy Brown Evolved Texture Print/Brandy Brown
Gardenia White Camping Scenic Print/Utility Brown
Mineral Purple Cactus Camo Print/Khaki Stone/Lemon Yellow

byLineInfo.name: Visit the THE NORTH FACE Store

features: Origin Made in the USA or Imported
EXPLORE ON. Vintage style with modern charm, the Berkeley Field Bag is a super convenient, lightweight and comfortable bag meant for carrying everything from your water bottle to your phone.
ADJUSTABLE FIT. Adjustable shoulder straps provide men and women with a comfortable carrying experience.

SECURE STORAGE. An internal, zippered compartment fits items like your water bottle, phone and keys. An external, fleece-lined pocket holds smaller items while a concealed pocket on the back provides more organization.

WATER-RESISTANT FABRIC. Made with 400D recycled nylon and coated with a Durable Water-Repellent (DWR) finish, this bag keeps your valuables safe and protected. Whether you're commuting, traveling or hitting the trail, this pack has you set.

TECH SPECS. Dimensions: 7.28" x 3.15" x 11.02" (18.4 cm x 8 cm x 27.9 cm); Strap length: Min 31" / Max 56" (78cm / 141cm); Avg Weight: 9.3 oz; Volume: 5 L. This item is not intended for use by children 12 and under.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #8,278 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #3 in Men's Handbags & Shoulder Bags #810 in Luggage & Travel Gear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size & sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This pack was definitely worth the money. It fits my iPad perfectly while still leaving room for some notebooks and my essentials such as phone, keys, and wallet. The pack fits snug across the torso or back and looks stylish with almost any outfit. Highly recommend for those tired of caring bulky backpacks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’m a mom and student and needed something that was easy to grab and put on, something durable, and something not too large but also not as small as a fanny pack. I needed it to hold my essentials—wallet, phone, keys, airpods— as well as books (I never leave my house without one) and this bag delivers on all of that with room to spare. Im able to put one large book or a few smaller ones in the main pocket, my essentials in the front pocket, and any slim items (like my kindle) in the smaller back pocket. It’s soooo easy to sling on and when I need my essentials I can easily slide it to the front of my body and unzip that front zipper to access them. The fabric is great, the bag is cute and stylish, and it’s durable. Seriously, obsessed with this! Better than a fanny pack and a open purse where stuff just falls out or is easily accessed by littles. I have no qualms with this. It’s perfect for my needs.If you’re not like me with the books, you can easily fit a water bottle and other items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tons of room!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this since I needed more space than my belt bag but didn’t want to go back to my normal purse. It’s perfect for all my things plus it’s convenient when out shopping! Quality is great and all the compartments are very useful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT !!! 😍🥰💓
reviews.reviewText: I bought this sling bag bc I was going to be doing a lot of walking around this weekend and wanted to be comfortable and secure; it was important to me to have a back pocket (anti-theft pocket) that faced me to keep all my most important stuff safe. This bag has it all! I’m also going to a wedding in NY in October so this will be perfect for traveling! 🩷🩷 I am obsessed with this sling! It’s pink, holds loads, is the perfect size, comfortable, secure and has an unique and sleek design! I also love how it has a handle and that little loop at the bottom, it’s such a cute detail, I think it could hold your sweater but I’m not completely sure. This bag can also hold a small water bottle. I definitely recommend! 🩷🩷🩷 🩷 I’m very picky when it comes to bags they have to be comfortable, hold a lot and have pockets! For a girly that is literally obsessed with bags I hate carrying them. After a while I just get tired of holding them and get uncomfortable. So this sling bag is definitely the perfect fit if you’re like me. 🩷

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best bag!
reviews.reviewText: This bag is my favorite thing ever. It is so cute, such great material, holds a great amount, and easy to take anywhere or to do anything with! I am so happy I got this bag, it has served me well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My Fiance biught this bag for me off of my wishlist for my birthday sland I love it even more than I thought I would. The black is a true, dark black and it doesn't seem to fade like others can. The material is lightweight, durable and water resistant! I use it as a purse or a little day bag for trips. The shape and size are super convient. I don't even have to take it off to access my things inside... since it has only one strap you can just slide/spin it from your backside to your front. It has 2 large ipperwd compartments and I always seem to be able to fit everything I need in it and more. It is a bit bigger than I thought it was though.. it's longer than a subway sandwich, and definitely wider than one! 😂 it is so perfect, I would consider buying it in another color as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel bag
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bag for a trip to Europe as I was afraid of being pickpocketed while traveling. Although it is pretty expensive compared to other crossbody bags, it's Northface, you're most likely paying for the name not the functionality. But this bag satisfies both, it is not only pretty large and can store many FLAT things, but it is also pretty sturdy and could probably withstand being pulled by a thief if it really came down to it. Keep in mind that this bag is in no way a normal bag. It is longer than it is wide, meaning it is meant to store flat thin things, not anything bulky unless you plan on carrying Rubik's cubes around. This does mean that you can carry your wallet, coins, cash, passports, and important documents which is what I used it for and it worked great, but once I put a normal sized water bottle in it, it couldn't hold it without looking odd and feeling off. So overall, this bag is good for carrying important things, not for usual backpack items, but it is an overall solid bag I would trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased as a gift
reviews.reviewText: My kid really liked this. She said it holds a lot and looks great.

reviews.reviewerName: Estaba muy entusiasmada con la llegada del perfume, en ocasiones anteriores lo había probado comprándolo en liverpool y me duraba el aroma desde la mañana a medio día . Esta compra que realicé se esfuma demasiado rápido, me hace pensar que no es el original
reviews.reviewText: El producto se ve usado, en malas condiciones , sucio.Pésima compra
